title: [Client] Can't Login
body: my internet is fine. is there something wrong with the server?

replies.body: its just endlessly trying to authenticate
Riot may need to reload their load balancer if they had one....authentication session is sticky to a black hole at this moment.

Got the same problem. I was forced to exit after an error, now I can't log back in.

Message I get on the legacy client: _"An unknown error has occurred. Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server. If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information."_

yes, i got an error and was forced to exit as well.  the client also acted really strange just before it happened too, 'find match' was greyed out and i couldn't exit the lobby...i was in the beta client.
bump tried both clients got 5 other ppl at the net cafe i am at having the same issue
